scripts.test-sms:scenarios: node scripts/testSMS.js advanced --scenario=pothole && node scripts/testSMS.js advanced --scenario=emergency && node scripts/testSMS.js advanced --scenario=community
scripts.test-sms:custom: node scripts/testSMS.js advanced --custom="I need help with trash pickup"
scripts.test-sms:ai-custom: node scripts/testSMS.js ai --message="I need help with city services"
scripts.test-sms:ai-pothole: node scripts/testSMS.js ai --message="There is a pothole on Main Street" --scenario=pothole
scripts.test-sms:ai-emergency: node scripts/testSMS.js ai --message="There is a water main break" --scenario=emergency
scripts.test-sms:ai-community: node scripts/testSMS.js ai --message="I need food assistance programs" --scenario=community
scripts.test-sms:all: node scripts/testSMS.js basic && node scripts/testSMS.js advanced --scenario=pothole && node scripts/testSMS.js advanced --scenario=emergency && node scripts/testSMS.js advanced --scenario=community && node scripts/testSMS.js advanced --custom="I need help with trash pickup"
